document_data.name: Shadow Wing
document_data.mainbody: '''Shadow Wing''' was an extra-planar [[vargouille]] that came to reside in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: Originally from a distant world, Shadow Wing entered Myth Drannor through a ''[[portal]]'' caused by its unstable ''[[mythal]]''. It then laired in the ruins of the [[Dlabraddath]] district.
